amendment.description: To provide appropriate adjustments to the discretionary spending limits, in the event of funding under a continuing resolution.

vote.text: Amendment SA 106, under the order of 6/1/2023, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 48 - 51. Record Vote Number: 142.

action.text: Amendment SA 106 proposed by Senator Cotton. (consideration: CR S1888) To provide appropriate adjustments to the discretionary spending limits, in the event of funding under a continuing resolution.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 106 proposed by Senator Cotton.

Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 106, under the order of 6/1/2023, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 48 - 51. Record Vote Number: 142.

Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 106, under the order of 6/1/2023, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 48 - 51. Record Vote Number: 142.
